rows.label: qst100506_msg0002
rows.name:
Do you remember? I'm Hassane, the
one who had you investigate the
ancient Nopon mural before.

rows.label: qst100506_msg0003
rows.name:
Even after you found the key, I
stayed here to investigate the
traces of the ancient Nopon tribe.

rows.label: qst100506_msg0004
rows.name:
The location of the hero's
treasure written on the mural...

rows.label: qst100506_msg0005
rows.name:
And now, you have just discovered
that very treasure...!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0006
rows.name: How on earth did you get here?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0007
rows.name: That key in the door in Avaritia!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0008
rows.name:
Haha... I see. I had heard there
was an ancient Nopon base here.

rows.label: qst100506_msg0009
rows.name:
So the truth was at the
main base after all!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0010
rows.name:
So, what kind of treasure
did you find...?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0011
rows.name: Hmm... Gold and a book... Th-this is!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0012
rows.name:
It's the journal written by the
legendary pirate, Captain Nopopon!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0013
rows.name:
I'd love to read it, but...
you were sent here by someone
else, weren't you?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0014
rows.name:
As a fellow researcher of
the ancient Nopon tribe, I
can't just find out first.

rows.label: qst100506_msg0015
rows.name:
I'll wait for it to be
published eventually.
